{{ja-kanjitab|ふ|o1=み|き|o2=り|yomi=kun}}

===Etymology===
From {{m|ja|踏む|sc=Jpan}} (''fumu'', "step on," "tread on," "stamp") + {{m|ja|切る|sc=Jpan}} (''kiru'', "perform an action as if by cutting")

===Pronunciation===
* {{ja-pron|ふみきり|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ふみきり}}

# [[railroad crossing]]

====Alternative forms====
* {{l|ja|踏切}} is the most common form
* {{l|ja|踏み切り}}: next most common
* {{l|ja|踏切り}}
* {{l|ja|踏み切}}: least common

====Derived terms====
* {{l|ja|踏切番}} (''fumikiriban''): gatekeeper crossing guard
* {{l|ja|無人踏切}} (''mujin fumikiri''): unstaffed railway crossing
